price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߯ߦߊߣߍ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߓߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߞߣߐ߫ ߦߏ߫ ߕߐ߲߬ ߝߊ߬ߙߊ߲߬ߝߊ߬ߙߊ߲߬ߠߊ
arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khushaʿan abṣāruhum yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashirun
